meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being like a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: His gentlemanlikeness was evident in the way he held the door open for others.
meanings.sent2: She admired his gentlemanlikeness and how he always treated everyone with respect.
meanings.sent3: Even in a silly hat, his gentlemanlikeness shone through.
meanings.sent4: His gentlemanlikeness was a beacon of kindness in a world of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with an air of gentlemanlikeness whenever he entered.

meanings.definition: The behavior or mannerisms typically associated with a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: His gentlemanlikeness was reflected in his polite greetings and courteous gestures.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his gentlemanlikeness, especially when he offered his seat to the elderly lady.
meanings.sent3: His gentlemanlikeness even extended to the way he folded his napkin at dinner.
meanings.sent4: In a world of rudeness, his gentlemanlikeness stood out like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The play exuded an aura of gentlemanlikeness with its well-mannered characters.
